ingredients.label: Graham crackers
ingredients.note: I'd say any but - we exclusively buy Nabisco Honey Maid Grahams

ingredients.label: Jelly, Lemon Curd, any sort of sweet spreadable filling

instructions.step: Break the sheets in half, so they're squares comprised of two crackers.
On two of the squares, spread jelly thinly.
Sandwich them with the other squares.
Wait 10-15 minutes for some of the moisture from the jelly to get into the cracker. You don't want the cracker to be crunchy, it should have a slight resistance and be more like shortbread.
